thread.title: NBMAA Uncorked Fundraiser - Courant

author: courant.com
title: NBMAA Uncorked Fundraiser - Courant
text:
Caption NBMAA Uncorked Alex Syphers | Special to the Courant Alex Syphers | Special to the Courant NBMAA Uncorked Alex Syphers | Special to the Courant Alex Syphers | Special to the Courant See more galleries The New Britain Museum of American Art celebrated the completion of its Art & Education expansion Thursday evening, Oct. 15, during the NBMAA Uncorked fundraiser event. Patrons of the museum were able to explore the new building and galleries while tasting wines and hors d'oeuvres from dozens of local restaurants.
Alex Syphers | Special to the Courant
